name: Marble-O-Tron
summary: Pick from multiple marble packs and 3 difficulty levels! Be warned though the larger the chain you take away the bigger the new dropped marble will be. This game is designed to be relaxing and completely stress free. There are no timers. Just try to end the game with the smallest marbles you can to score the coveted 3 stars The kids love this game too. Its simple enough for even toddlers to pick up and understand.
